title: New Analyst Onboarding
description: A comprehensive learning path for analysts new to Splunk and security operations. Build foundational skills from search basics to your first investigation.
objectives: Understand SPL fundamentals and search anatomy
Master filtering, field extraction, and data manipulation
Learn to aggregate and visualize security data
Complete your first simulated investigation

steps.title: Finding Your Data
steps.description: Learn how to search the right data using index and sourcetype.

steps.title: Anatomy of a Search
steps.description: Deep dive into how SPL searches flow through the pipeline.

steps.title: Filtering Your Results
steps.description: Learn to use where, search, and other filtering commands.

steps.title: Working with Fields
steps.description: Learn to select and display only the fields you need.

steps.title: The Stats Command
steps.description: Master the most important aggregation command in SPL.

steps.title: Counting and Summarizing
steps.description: Learn different ways to count and summarize your security events.

steps.title: Time-Based Analysis
steps.description: Visualize trends over time with timechart and related commands.

steps.title: SPL Reference Review
steps.description: Explore the SPL command reference to reinforce your learning.

steps.title: Query Library Exploration
steps.description: Browse real-world security queries for inspiration.

steps.title: Your First Investigation
steps.description: Apply everything you learned in a simulated security investigation.

title: Threat Hunting Fundamentals
description: Move from reactive alerting to proactive threat detection. Learn hypothesis-driven hunting methodology and apply it to real attack patterns.
objectives: Understand hypothesis-driven threat hunting methodology
Establish behavioral baselines for anomaly detection
Hunt for lateral movement, persistence, and evasion techniques
Build reusable hunt queries from threat intelligence

steps.title: Hunting Methodology
steps.description: Learn the hypothesis-driven approach to proactive threat hunting.

steps.title: Baselining Normal Behavior
steps.description: Establish what 'normal' looks like so you can spot anomalies.

steps.title: Statistical Baselines in SPL
steps.description: Build dynamic statistical baselines with eventstats and streamstats.

steps.title: Finding Brute Force Attacks
steps.description: Detect password guessing and credential stuffing attacks.

steps.title: Hunt: Lateral Movement
steps.description: Track an attacker moving through your network after initial compromise.

steps.title: Detecting Impossible Travel
steps.description: Find geographically impossible authentication patterns.

steps.title: Hunt: Impossible Travel Scenario
steps.description: Investigate a user appearing in multiple countries simultaneously.

steps.title: Hunt: Beaconing Detection
steps.description: Find command-and-control traffic hiding in regular intervals.

steps.title: Hunt: Persistence Mechanisms
steps.description: Discover how attackers maintain access after system reboots.

steps.title: Developing Hunt Hypotheses
steps.description: Practice converting threat intel into testable hunt queries.

title: Enterprise Security Mastery
description: Master Splunk Enterprise Security for SOC operations. Learn to leverage data models, risk-based alerting, and correlation searches for efficient threat detection.
objectives: Navigate ES efficiently using data models and tstats
Implement risk-based alerting to reduce alert fatigue
Investigate notable events using the ES workflow
Build custom correlation searches and detection rules

steps.title: ES for Splunk Users
steps.description: Understand how ES changes your Splunk workflow and why.

steps.title: Understanding Data Models
steps.description: Learn how CIM data models organize and accelerate your data.

steps.title: tstats vs stats
steps.description: Master the query paradigm shift that makes ES searches fast.

steps.title: Using tstats with Data Models
steps.description: Write efficient aggregate queries using ES accelerated data.

steps.title: Notable Events Explained
steps.description: Understand your new alert queue and how it differs from traditional alerts.

steps.title: Your First Notable Investigation
steps.description: Walk through the complete investigation workflow for a notable event.

steps.title: Risk-Based Alerting Philosophy
steps.description: Learn why RBA reduces alert fatigue and how it works.

steps.title: RBA Fundamentals Guide
steps.description: Deep dive into risk scoring, attribution, and thresholds.

steps.title: Investigating High-Risk Users
steps.description: Analyze a user with elevated risk score and trace contributing events.

steps.title: Asset and Identity Enrichment
steps.description: Add business context to your events using ES lookups.

steps.title: Standard to tstats Translation
steps.description: Practice converting traditional SPL queries to efficient ES format.

steps.title: Creating Correlation Searches
steps.description: Build your own detection rules that generate notables and risk.

steps.title: Notable Triage Challenge
steps.description: Test your skills triaging and prioritizing a queue of notables.

steps.title: Risk Investigation Query
steps.description: Build a comprehensive risk investigation query from scratch.

title: SPL Mastery Bootcamp
description: Level up your search skills from basic to advanced. Master the stats family, eval functions, rex patterns, and query optimization techniques that separate good analysts from great ones.
objectives: Master the stats family: stats, eventstats, and streamstats
Build powerful field transformations with eval functions
Extract data from unstructured text using rex patterns
Optimize query performance with efficient search practices

steps.title: Where vs Search: Filtering Mastery
steps.description: Understand when to use where versus search for optimal filtering.

steps.title: Stats Command Deep Dive
steps.description: Master aggregation functions beyond basic count.

steps.title: Eventstats: Stats Without Collapse
steps.description: Add aggregated values to events without losing detail.

steps.title: Streamstats: Running Calculations
steps.description: Calculate running totals, averages, and window functions.

steps.title: Eval Functions Library
steps.description: Transform fields with string, numeric, and conditional functions.

steps.title: Rex Pattern Extraction
steps.description: Extract fields from raw text using regular expressions.

steps.title: Performance Optimization Tips
steps.description: Write faster searches with efficient command ordering.

steps.title: SPL Mastery Challenge
steps.description: Test your skills with complex multi-step search challenges.

title: Security Investigation Fundamentals
description: Develop structured investigation methodology for SOC analysts. Learn to interpret Windows event logs, correlate authentication events, build timelines, and document findings professionally.
objectives: Interpret Windows Security event logs for investigation
Correlate authentication events across multiple sources
Build comprehensive investigation timelines
Document and present investigation findings

steps.title: Windows Events 101
steps.description: Understand critical Windows Security event codes and their meaning.

steps.title: Authentication Event Correlation
steps.description: Connect login events across endpoints, domain controllers, and applications.

steps.title: Detecting Brute Force Attacks
steps.description: Identify password guessing and credential stuffing patterns.

steps.title: Lateral Movement Detection
steps.description: Track attacker movement through your network after initial access.

steps.title: Building Investigation Timelines
steps.description: Create chronological event sequences for incident reconstruction.

steps.title: Multi-Source Correlation
steps.description: Combine data from endpoints, network, and identity sources.

steps.title: Investigation Documentation
steps.description: Record findings with queries, screenshots, and conclusions.

steps.title: Full Investigation Scenario
steps.description: Complete an end-to-end investigation from alert to documentation.

title: Dashboard Development for Security Operations
description: Build operational dashboards that drive SOC action and accelerate investigations. Master visualization selection, real-time monitoring patterns, investigation drilldowns, and dashboard performance optimization to create dashboards your team will actually use every shift.
objectives: Select appropriate visualizations for different security data patterns
Build real-time monitoring dashboards for SOC operations
Implement investigation-focused drilldowns and context panels
Optimize dashboard performance for production use
Configure actionable alerts integrated with dashboard workflows

steps.title: SOC Dashboard Design Principles
steps.description: Learn dashboard archetypes, visual hierarchy, and the three-second glance rule.

steps.title: Visualization Selection for Security Data
steps.description: Choose the right visualization type for different security data patterns.

steps.title: Timechart Mastery for Security Monitoring
steps.description: Build time-series visualizations with proper span selection and baseline overlays.

steps.title: Building Effective SOC KPIs
steps.description: Create single-value panels with sparklines, thresholds, and trend indicators.

steps.title: Building Investigation-Ready Tables
steps.description: Design tables optimized for security triage with conditional formatting.

steps.title: Building Your First SOC Monitoring Dashboard
steps.description: Build an authentication monitoring dashboard and investigate a detected spike.

steps.title: Tokens and Input Controls for Investigation
steps.description: Add interactivity with time pickers, dropdowns, and cascading filters.

steps.title: Drilldowns for Security Investigation
steps.description: Enable click-through investigation to raw events and external tools.

steps.title: Alert to Resolution: Dashboard Investigation Workflow
steps.description: Complete an investigation from alert notification to root cause identification.

steps.title: Dashboard Performance for Production
steps.description: Optimize dashboards with base searches, tstats, and report acceleration.

steps.title: Connecting Dashboards and Alerts
steps.description: Promote searches to alerts with proper thresholds and dashboard links.

steps.title: Build a Complete SOC Operations Dashboard
steps.description: Build a privileged account monitoring dashboard meeting specific constraints.

title: Threat Intelligence Integration
description: Enhance your detections with external intelligence. Learn to integrate threat feeds, perform IOC matching with lookups, manage false positives, and enrich events with contextual data.
objectives: Understand threat intelligence fundamentals and feed types
Integrate IOC lookups for automated enrichment
Use subsearches for correlation and matching
Implement GeoIP and context enrichment

steps.title: Threat Intelligence Fundamentals
steps.description: Understand TI types, sources, and operational use cases.

steps.title: Lookup Tables for IOC Matching
steps.description: Create and maintain IOC lookup tables for detection.

steps.title: Automatic Lookup Enrichment
steps.description: Configure automatic field lookups for seamless enrichment.

steps.title: Subsearch Correlation Techniques
steps.description: Use subsearches to correlate events with threat intelligence.

steps.title: GeoIP Enrichment
steps.description: Add geographic context to IP addresses for analysis.

steps.title: Managing False Positives
steps.description: Build allowlists and tune detections to reduce noise.

steps.title: Custom Threat Feeds
steps.description: Integrate custom and third-party threat intelligence feeds.

steps.title: TI Integration Challenge
steps.description: Build a complete threat intelligence workflow from feed to alert.

title: Data Onboarding Mastery
description: Master the art of ingesting new data sources into Splunk. Learn input configuration, field extraction, data normalization, and quality validation for reliable, searchable data.
objectives: Configure data inputs using inputs.conf
Create custom field extractions with props.conf and transforms.conf
Normalize data with field aliasing and CIM compliance
Troubleshoot parsing issues and validate data quality

steps.title: Data Ingestion Architecture
steps.description: Understand how data flows from source to searchable index.

steps.title: Configuring Data Inputs
steps.description: Set up file monitors, network inputs, and scripted inputs.

steps.title: Event Breaking and Timestamps
steps.description: Configure props.conf for proper event boundaries and time extraction.

steps.title: Field Extraction Methods
steps.description: Create search-time and index-time field extractions.

steps.title: Transforms and Lookups
steps.description: Use transforms.conf for complex extractions and enrichment.

steps.title: Field Aliasing and CIM
steps.description: Normalize fields to Common Information Model standards.

steps.title: Parsing Troubleshooting
steps.description: Diagnose and fix common data parsing issues.

steps.title: Data Quality Validation
steps.description: Verify ingested data meets quality and completeness standards.

steps.title: Onboarding Challenge
steps.description: Onboard a new data source from raw logs to normalized fields.

title: Search Optimization and Performance
description: Optimize your Splunk deployment for speed and efficiency. Master Job Inspector analysis, search optimization techniques, summary indexing, and resource management.
objectives: Analyze search performance with Job Inspector
Apply search optimization techniques for faster results
Implement report acceleration and summary indexing
Manage search quotas and resource allocation

steps.title: Search Architecture Deep Dive
steps.description: Understand how searches execute across indexers and search heads.

steps.title: Job Inspector Mastery
steps.description: Read and interpret Job Inspector metrics for optimization.

steps.title: Search Optimization Techniques
steps.description: Apply best practices for faster, more efficient searches.

steps.title: Command Order and Efficiency
steps.description: Structure searches to minimize data processing.

steps.title: Report Acceleration
steps.description: Speed up dashboards with pre-computed report results.

steps.title: Summary Indexing
steps.description: Create summary indexes for long-term trend analysis.

steps.title: Search Quotas and Limits
steps.description: Configure and manage search resource allocation.

steps.title: Performance Monitoring
steps.description: Monitor search performance across your deployment.

steps.title: Optimization Challenge
steps.description: Diagnose and fix performance issues in slow searches.

title: Detection Engineering
description: Build robust detection content for your security program. Learn detection design principles, correlation search development, statistical baselines, and detection lifecycle management.
objectives: Apply detection engineering design principles
Build correlation searches with appropriate logic
Implement statistical baselines for anomaly detection
Manage detection lifecycle from creation to retirement

steps.title: Detection Engineering Principles
steps.description: Learn the foundations of effective detection design.

steps.title: MITRE ATT&CK Mapping
steps.description: Align detections with the MITRE ATT&CK framework.

steps.title: Correlation Search Development
steps.description: Build searches that identify security-relevant patterns.

steps.title: Statistical Baselines
steps.description: Create dynamic thresholds using historical behavior.

steps.title: Throttling and Suppression
steps.description: Control alert volume without missing true positives.

steps.title: Detection Testing Methodology
steps.description: Validate detections with atomic tests and purple team exercises.

steps.title: Detection Documentation
steps.description: Document detections for maintenance and knowledge transfer.

steps.title: Detection Lifecycle Management
steps.description: Maintain detections from creation through retirement.

steps.title: Detection Engineering Challenge
steps.description: Build a complete detection from threat intel to production.

title: Incident Response Automation
description: Build automated response capabilities to accelerate incident handling. Learn alert actions, SOAR integration, adaptive response configuration, and response auditing.
objectives: Configure alert actions for automated response
Integrate with SOAR platforms via webhooks and REST
Design response playbooks for common scenarios
Audit and monitor automated actions

steps.title: Alert Action Architecture
steps.description: Understand how alert actions execute and chain together.

steps.description: Configure email, script, and webhook alert actions.

steps.description: Send alerts to external systems via HTTP webhooks.

steps.description: Trigger external actions through REST API calls.

steps.description: Connect Splunk alerts to SOAR playbook automation.

steps.description: Design effective automated response playbooks.

steps.description: Configure ES adaptive response for automated remediation.

steps.title: Action Monitoring and Audit
steps.description: Track and audit automated actions for compliance.

steps.title: Automation Challenge
steps.description: Build an end-to-end automated response workflow.

title: Data Model Architecture
description: Design scalable data infrastructure with custom data models. Master CIM alignment, acceleration optimization, and advanced tstats patterns for enterprise-scale analytics.
objectives: Understand CIM data model structure and purpose
Design and build custom data models
Optimize data model acceleration for performance
Master advanced tstats patterns for complex queries

steps.title: CIM Deep Dive
steps.description: Understand the Common Information Model architecture.

steps.description: Learn object hierarchies, constraints, and inheritance.

steps.title: Custom Data Model Design
steps.description: Build data models for your unique data sources.

steps.title: Data Model Acceleration
steps.description: Configure and optimize TSIDX acceleration.

steps.title: Acceleration Strategy
steps.description: Plan acceleration coverage and retention policies.

steps.title: Basic tstats Patterns
steps.description: Write efficient queries using accelerated data models.

steps.title: Advanced tstats Techniques
steps.description: Master complex tstats patterns with prestats and append.

steps.title: Data Model Maintenance
steps.description: Monitor health and troubleshoot acceleration issues.

steps.title: Data Model Challenge
steps.description: Design and implement a custom accelerated data model.

title: Risk-Based Alerting Mastery
description: Implement a comprehensive RBA strategy to reduce alert fatigue. Learn risk framework design, modifier configuration, entity attribution, and threshold optimization.
objectives: Design a risk-based alerting framework
Configure risk modifiers and scoring rules
Implement entity-based risk attribution
Tune thresholds and optimize risk notables

steps.title: RBA Philosophy and Benefits
steps.description: Understand why RBA reduces alert fatigue effectively.

steps.description: Understand risk index structure and event flow.

steps.title: Risk Factor Design
steps.description: Design risk factors aligned with your threat model.

steps.title: Risk Modifier Configuration
steps.description: Configure context-aware risk score adjustments.

steps.description: Attribute risk accurately to users and systems.

steps.description: Set up risk notables with appropriate thresholds.

steps.description: Optimize thresholds using statistical analysis.

title: Advanced Analytics and Machine Learning
description: Implement advanced detection capabilities using MLTK algorithms. Learn anomaly detection, behavioral baselines, multi-factor scoring, and user behavior analytics.
objectives: Select appropriate ML algorithms for security use cases
Implement anomaly detection for threat hunting
Build multi-factor scoring models
Create user behavior analytics baselines

Plan disaster recovery and multi-site replication
